android.title: How to setup a Android stream app
android.description: Follow these steps to configure your Android device for streaming.

steps.title: Enable Developer Options
steps.description: Go to Settings > About Phone and tap Build Number 7 times.

steps.title: Enable USB Debugging
steps.description: In Developer Options, switch on USB Debugging.

windows.title: How to setup a windows side connection?
windows.description: Select your preferred usage mode to see the setup instructions.

options.label: Cmd mode
options.description: Run via Command Line Interface for advanced users.

options.label: GUI mode
options.description: Run via Graphical User Interface for ease of use.

steps.title: Run Connect Command
steps.description: Execute the connection command provided in the documentation.

steps.title: Select Device
steps.description: Choose your connected device from the list.
